channel.title: Footwear – AT Surgical
channel.description: Manufacturers of Orthopedic Braces and Supports since 1975

item.title: Shin Protector Sleeve
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
• Sleeve with 3 mm gel polymer soft cushion pads moulded at the shin, protecting it from abrasion, friction, and pinching when practicing sports
  • Used under the socks with the pad either in contact to the skin or facing the sock
  • Washable and reusable

The post Shin Protector Sleeve appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded: The post Shin Protector Sleeve appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Hallux Valgus/Bunion Soft Splint, Pair
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The Bunion Soft Splint is a light and ultra-thin support that helps protect against blisters and other irritation. An adjustable Velcro™ strap allows you to customize to the proper fit. One size fits most, up to size 11 men or 12.5 women. Comes in pairs.

The post Hallux Valgus/Bunion Soft Splint, Pair appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• Day / night splint provides light intensity traction and help protect against blisters, rubbing, and increasing redness.
  • Comfortable & effective bunion splinting
  • Works while you rest or sleep, or in spacious shoes
  • Maintains proper alignment
  • Stretches and strengthens foot muscles, ligaments

The post Hallux Valgus/Bunion Soft Splint, Pair appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Metatarsal Protector Pads for Sandals
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Pure Gel Self Adhesive Metatarsal Protector Pads for Flip Flop Sandals are specially designed for open toe footwear and thong sandals in particular. Measuring 3.75" long & 2.5" wide at the ball of the foot and 2mm thick, the soft polymer gel cushion protects the ball of the foot region by absorbing shock and evenly distributing weight. A built in low profile toe spreader helps to part the toes gently and further reduce rubbing and irritation. A hypoallergenic self adhesive backing fastenes the pad securely in place.

  • Cushions and absorbs shock at the ball of the foot or metatarsal regiion to redistribute pressure and reduce friction for relief from soreness and a burning sensation in the feet
  • Built in toe spreader provides protection from irritation caused in between the toes by wrapping around and guarding the toe thongs on flip flop sandals
  • Hypoallergenic self adhesive backing securely fastens the pad in place during use
  • Latex free medical grade gel polymer

The post Metatarsal Protector Pads for Sandals appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded: The post Metatarsal Protector Pads for Sandals appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Gel Lined Bunion Protector Sleeve
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
• 1 Size Fits Most
  • Sleeve stretches to accommodate several sizes
  • Low profile, ergonomic design takes up minimal space in shoes for max comfort
  • Latex Free, Durable, Washable & Reusable

The post Gel Lined Bunion Protector Sleeve appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
This sleeve fits securely over the big toe, helping to keep it securely in place. An open toe design keeps the rest of your toes free from constraint. Soft Deramed gel lining contains mineral oil to moisturize and hydrate the skin, helping to break down calluses while elasticized fabric compression sleeve lined with gel to protect and comfort painful areas prone to bunions and irritation.

The post Gel Lined Bunion Protector Sleeve appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Moisturizing Gel Lined Microfiber Heel Sleeves, Pair
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Wear AT Surgical Moisturizing Gel Lined Microfiber Heel Sleeves while sleeping or resting or in closed shoes to soften dry, cracked, rough heels. The inside of the heel area of these heel socks is lined with a moisturizing silicone gel that helps to repair damaged skin. Keeps your heels soft & smooth by eliminating cracks and hard, rough skin - helping to soothe, moisturize and heal tough calluses.

  • The fabric of the heel sleeves is vented at the top and leave an open toe so you can feel comfortable, cool and dry while you sleep
  • May use with moisturizing lotions, creams or other topical treatments for even faster results
  • Washable and reusable.

The post Moisturizing Gel Lined Microfiber Heel Sleeves, Pair appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded: The post Moisturizing Gel Lined Microfiber Heel Sleeves, Pair appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Moisturizing Gel Heel Sock
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Softens foot hypertrophy by moisturizing and smoothening skin with embedded mineral oils. Materials are environment-friendly and can be recycled.

  • Jojoba Oil for moisturizing skin
  • Avocado Oil for comforting skin
  • Olive Oil for anti-aging
  • Grape Seed Oil for skin anti-oxidation

The post Moisturizing Gel Heel Sock appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded: The post Moisturizing Gel Heel Sock appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Gel Heel Socks, One Pair
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
These comfortable soft heel socks reduce friction, alleviate pain, soften foot hypertrophy, and moisturize and smoothen skin, while breathing holes keep the ankle comfortable.

The gel is made with inorganic antibacterial ingredients that prevent odor, while the gel's memory fits many shapes of foot. All materials are environment-friendly and can be recycled.

The post Gel Heel Socks, One Pair appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded: The post Gel Heel Socks, One Pair appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Gel Five Toe Spreader, One Pair
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Made of durable, soft and safe medical-grade silicone gel, softening the painful sensitive skin to cover bunion with its flexible touch. Soft and easy to clean with soap and water. Wear this to relieve foot pain after being on your feet all day & to improve toe alignment after wearing cramped shoes. The one-size-fits-all Toe Stretchers simply slip on and instantly begin to provide relief by improving the alignment of each and every toe.

The post Gel Five Toe Spreader, One Pair appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
Toe stretchers help to improve…

  • Circulation
  • Straighten bent toes
  • Realign joints

They can be used for both the prevention and treatment of a number of different foot and toe problems such as…

  • Plantar fasciitis
  • Hammer
  • Mallet & Claw Toe
  • Bunions
  • Corns & Calluses
  • Bone Spurs
  • Achilles problems
  • Varicose Veins
  • Cramps
  • Toe stiffness
  • Arthritis
  • Overlapping toes
  • Morton’s Neuroma
  • Metatarsalgia.

The post Gel Five Toe Spreader, One Pair appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Gel Bunion Guard with Toe Spreader
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Toe Spreader fits comfortably in most footwear and helps separate and stretch toe overlap, relieving pressure and friction to the hallux valgus. Inorganic antibacterial ingredients…

The post Gel Bunion Guard with Toe Spreader appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
Toe Spreader fits comfortably in most footwear and helps separate and stretch toe overlap, relieving pressure and friction to the hallux valgus. Inorganic antibacterial ingredients can prevent bacterial growth while unique gel memory formulations fit all kinds of foot shape. The materials are environment-friendly and can be recycled.

The post Gel Bunion Guard with Toe Spreader appeared first on AT Surgical.
